Posts.Content: clifgoodenough wrote: i had a small cyst 4 years ago.. had the mammo and ultra.. doctor said just let it be, its not cancerous.. well i went to another doctor and he did the mamo and the uktrasound and wants to do a needle biopsy, taking 5 samples with this huge needle. he won't give me any anxiety meds...the lump is above my nipple and is an inch long.. same as it was 4 years ago..i'm am soooooooooooooooo scared.....pray for me..lassy moggs Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: have to go mon. for a biopsy..damn i am scared clifgoodenough Harley44

Posts.Content: clifgoodenough wrote: i am supposed to have a needle biopsy on monday.. i asked the doctor doing it if he could prescribe "just 1 ativan" pill for me because i am reallyyyyyyyyyyy nervous. he told me he can't because he doesn't know my history. i just moved here....i just don't think he has much compassion.. i don't think i am going..i can't do this without something.. he showed me the needle...that was enough for me..i'm losing my mind with worry!!!!!!! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Disturbing answer from "my so-called doctor" clifgoodenough Marilynn2007

Posts.Content: clifgoodenough wrote: I went for my core biopsy today. the doctor had heard from my surgeon about my horrible experience a few weeks ago with another doctor i had for my ultrasound(who i cancelled with because he wouldn't give me 1 ativan for my nerves before the biopsy)he hurt me so bad doing the ultrasound i had bruises and skin worn off my breast. anyway.. i was waiting and the nurse came in and said the doctor wanted to do another ultrasound on me, before the test.. the nurse statrted and the doctor came in and did one also....HE SAW NOTHING STRANGE, JUST THE SMALL CYST I HAD 4 YEARS AGO THAT IS THE SAME AS IT WAS. I was told to leave it alone unless it was causing me discomfort...he didn't have those ultrasound tests, but had THE OTHER CRAZY DOCTOR'S.. HE KEPT SAYING THIS IS SO STRANGE....HE SAID HE SAW NO SIGHT OF CANCER, AND IT WAS THE SAME CYST I HAD 4 YEARS AGO.. HE ASKED ME IF THAT DOCTOR HAD AN ACCENT?? I SAID YES AN ENGLISH ONE.. HE JUST SHOOK HIS HEAD...he said no reason to do a core biopsy and he will call me when he gets the ultrasound pictures from 4 years ago.. he told me it IS A CYST.. THE OTHER DOCTOR SAID IT WAS NOT.......SO I AM HAPPY, BUT MAD AS WELL.. I HAVE WENT THRU PURE HELL OVER THIS MISTAKE.. IF YOU CAN CALL IT ONE!!!!!! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: This is UNBELIEVEABLE!!!!!!! clifgoodenough leaf

Posts.Content: clifgoodenough wrote: my doctor told me today. that i was a 4 on the breast scale of the worst being 6... does anyone know about that scale? and i asked before is ativan better to take or is valium to make me sane during this core biopsy???? i just wish they would take the problem out completely!!!!
